question: Can the level 1 [class, race: unknown] type "hacker" use criminal skill to hack into the system and make it even more sweet, if they have 3 criminal skill points?
answer: Yes, the character can roll twice and take the lower of the dice for the criminal skill check. If the result is 3 or lower, the check succeeds.
rules_explanation: Because the challenge in the game is to roll equal or under the skill value, the roll that matters for success is the lowest roll. So the advantage condition is reversed. If the roll of the dice is equal to or under the skill number, the check is successful.
